title: ABA Therapy
description: Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) therapy is an evidence-based treatment approach for autism spectrum disorder that uses behavioral principles to teach skills and reduce challenging behaviors. ABA therapy is individualized to each person's needs and can address communication, social skills, daily living activities, and academic abilities. Therapy is delivered by Board Certified Behavior Analysts and trained therapists in various settings including homes, clinics, and schools. Florida has extensive ABA provider networks, and services are covered by most insurance plans including Medicaid when medically necessary.
